entries.title: Nano Banana Pro — JSON Prompting
entries.summary: Meta-prompt for converting descriptions into detailed JSON prompts. Covers dynamic fields, subject specificity, aesthetic goals.
entries.content:
Full blog: https://fofr.ai/posts/json-prompting-image-flash

Key: Dynamic fields for subject types, remove irrelevant fields, always include constraints and negative_prompt. Be precise on lighting, camera, medium specificity.

entries.title: Nano Banana Pro — Miniature Diorama JSON
entries.summary: Turn scenes into collectible-scale miniature dioramas. Full JSON structure provided.
entries.content: Comprehensive JSON covering: reference_images, concept, environment (tabletop scale, white backdrop), objects_and_elements, composition (isometric 3/4), camera (35-50mm), lighting (soft studio), materials. Also works for Matrix 'Bullet Time' recreation.

entries.title: Nano Banana Pro — Figurine/Miniature Selfie
entries.summary: Simple prompt for creating personal figurines from selfies.
entries.content:
Prompt: 'Make a miniature, full-body, isometric, realistic figurine of this person, wearing ABC, doing XYZ, on a white background, minimal, 4K resolution.'

Process: Google AI Studio → Nano Banana Pro → upload selfie → prompt.

entries.title: Nano Banana Pro — JSON Variant Generation
entries.summary: Workflow for generating variations while preserving vibe/aesthetic.
entries.content:
1. Take existing image
2. Ask Gemini 3 Pro to make JSON prompt
3. Run prompt to test fidelity
4. Run with variant prefix: 'Generate new image with SIGNIFICANTLY different nouns, objects, color palette and pose... CRITICAL: Strictly preserve original vibe, aesthetic, mood.'

entries.title: Nano Banana Pro — Diagram Suite (Weavy)
entries.summary: Visual forensics workflow: 1 image → 16 forensic diagrams.
entries.content: 16 system prompts analyzing: Geometry, Spacing, Composition, Light, Color, Narrative, Optics, Surface Materials, Psychology, Flow, Tokenizer. Full workflow in thread.

entries.title: Nano Banana Pro — Camera Angle Control
entries.summary: Detailed reference-based prompting for camera angle control.
entries.content: Technique: 'Analyze the reference images and catalog all minor details... Show me a view from a high angle looking down at the car at an angle.' Specify exact character positions, color matching, placement matching.

entries.title: Node Banana — All FAL + Replicate Models
entries.summary: Node Banana supports all image/video models from FAL and Replicate. Free and open source.

entries.title: Krea AI — Realtime Edit
entries.summary: Edit images with complex instructions in real time. Like Nano Banana but for editing.

entries.title: Kling Motion Control
entries.summary: Insights on using Kling Motion Control for AI video.

entries.title: Glif MCP — Creative Engine for Claude Code
entries.summary: Turn Claude Code into creative engine with access to Nano Banana Pro, Kling, Veo 3.

entries.title: Karpathy — Claude Coding Notes (MUST READ)
entries.summary: Andrej Karpathy's workflow: 80% agent + 20% manual. 'Programming in English now.' 33K+ likes.
entries.content:
Key insights:
- Models make subtle conceptual errors (hasty junior dev)
- Wrong assumptions, no clarifications sought
- Too sycophantic, overcomplicate code
- 'Stamina is core bottleneck, LLMs dramatically increased it'
- 'Don't tell it what to do, give success criteria'
- Programming MORE fun (drudgery removed)
- 'Slopacolypse' coming 2026

Workflow: Claude Code sessions in ghostty (left), IDE for viewing (right).

entries.title: Vibe Marketing Playbook (Free)
entries.summary: Free playbook: prompts, skills, MCPs for marketing/knowledge work.
entries.content:
Covers: prompt stacking, skills, MCPs, Claude Code for marketing, agency/SaaS/ecom use cases, frameworks for search/ads/email/landing pages.

Link: https://thevibemarketer.com/vibe-marketing-playbook.html
